Find the list of available grant opportunities below.  Click on the link for full details on each grant.

  • Notice of Funding Opportunity – Empowering Female Community Leaders in Countering Violent Extremism in Upper West Region [Closing Date: July 19, 2024]
  • Notice of Funding Opportunity – PEPFAR Program 2024 [Closing Date: July 30, 2024]
  • Notice of Funding Opportunity – Strengthening Democracy and Civic Engagement during Ghana’s 2024 Electoral Process [CLOSED]
  • Public Diplomacy Section Annual Program Statement Request for Statements of Interest  [CLOSED]
